korean: 오늘 날씨가 너무 좋아서 오랜만에 자전거로 출근했다.
시원한 바람을 맞으며 페달을 밟으니 정말 상쾌했다.
한강변 길로 가니까 풍경도 예쁘고 스트레스가 다 날아갔어.
차로 가면 막히는 구간도 자전거는 쭉 지나갈 수 있어서 좋았다.
운동도 되고 교통비도 아껴서 완전 일석이조야.
회사 도착하니까 약간 땀이 났지만 개운했어.
동료들이 자전거 타고 온 거 보고 부러워했다.
샤워 시설이 있어서 깔끔하게 씻고 업무 시작했어.
오후에도 기분이 좋아서 업무 효율이 올랐다.
퇴근할 때도 자전거 타고 가니까 운동 시간이 따로 필요 없어.
건강도 챙기고 환경도 보호하는 느낌이라 뿌듯해.
앞으로 날 좋은 날엔 자주 타야겠다는 생각이 들었어.
english: The weather was so nice today, so I commuted by bike for the first time in a while.
The morning air was refreshing and I felt great.
It was really refreshing to pedal while feeling the cool breeze.
I mean, taking the riverside path, the scenery was beautiful and all my stress just flew away.
The sections that get jammed with cars, I could just cruise right through on my bike.
You know, it's exercise and saving on transportation costs - total win-win.
When I arrived at the office I was a bit sweaty, but in a good way.
My coworkers saw me come in on my bike and they were jealous.
Actually, we have shower facilities, so I cleaned up and started work feeling fresh.
In the afternoon I was still in a good mood, so my work efficiency went up.
Riding home after work too, I don't need separate exercise time.
It feels good taking care of my health and protecting the environment at the same time.
I was thinking I should ride more often on nice days from now on.
Honestly, bike commuting - I totally recommend it.
